12000 years ago [VEGA was (almost) the polar star](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/Precession_N.gif). That might have triggered/reinforced human obsession with the skies.  

4000 years ago Thuban Ø«ÙØ¹Ù’Ø¨ÙØ§Ù† 'snake' was the polar star. Thuban like Theben? Unlikely.  

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/Precession_N.gif)
